code_sintax_explanation: 1. Missing colon at the end of the function definition in line 'def fun_1(l, t)'. It should be 'def fun_1(l, t):'. 2. Incorrect use of semicolon instead of commas in variable assignment 'x; y = 0; len(l) - 1'. It should be 'x, y = 0, len(l) - 1'. 3. Missing colon at the end of the while loop declaration 'while x <= y'. It should be 'while x <= y:'. 4. Incorrect reference to index 'd' should be 'D' in the condition 'if l[d] == t:', also in 'elif l[d] < t' and 'y = d - 1'. 5. Missing colon at the end of the elif statement 'elif l[d] < t'. It should be 'elif l[d] < t:'. 6. Missing colon at the end of the else statement 'else'. It should be 'else:'.
